text: Hagi havi avu'ava'ene kini ne' Omri'ma ante'nea kasegege tamagra amagera nenteta, kefo avu'ava'ene kini ne' Ahapu avu'ava'za amagera nentaze. Ana nehazanki'na Nagra tamagrira tamazeri haviza hanuge'za, vahe'mo'za neramage'za zamefi hunerami'za, kiza zokago ke huramantesnageta tamagazegu hugahaze.
